overview: Every living day will come to the beacon of Cevahir. Zekai uses his head to make a watch arrangement that controls the roulette wheel. Cevahir, sitting on the gambling table and losing without more equipment ready. Cevahir and his colleagues fly to Cyprus to save Piril from Cypriot casinos using the watch scheme. Bilal meets them in Cyprus.
title: Geniş Aile 2: Her Türlü
